NewsItem.HEADLINE: Handset 2019 Expert Insight 1 (PDF)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This strategic report examines the meaning of "speed" in the mobile user experience and illustrates the impact of 5G.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This report analyzes the launch time of various applications and highlights the time spent on loading software and cloud computing, which far outweighs the time allocated to data transfer over LTE or 5G. For many user experiences, "speed" will not be impacted by a faster radio, and this report lays out analysis to show how other changes are necessary.
